author: Kometa-Team
install_msg: SponsorCheck (API-only) installed. Configure a PAT via env GITHUB_PAT or /opt/red-botmoose/secrets/github_pat.txt. Commands: [p]sponsor, [p]sponsorlist, [p]sponsorreport. Owner tools: [p]sponsortoken check|reload|where.
name: sponsorcheck
short: GitHub Sponsors via GraphQL API: check/list + verify against a server role.
description: Fetches current & past sponsors (public + private) using GitHub GraphQL with includePrivate:true. Lists public names, counts private, and matches a guild 'Sponsor' role. No HTML scraping.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store any end user data.
